parameters.name: Biz
parameters.description:
The type of the asset fingerprint that you want to query. Default value: **sca**. Valid values:

*   **lkm**: kernel module
*   **autorun**: startup item
*   **web_server**: website

parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: ItemName
parameters.description:
The name of the aggregation item for the asset fingerprint that you want to query.

> You can call the [GetAssetsPropertyItem](~~GetAssetsPropertyItem~~) operation to query the names of aggregation items.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return on each page. Default value: 20. If you leave this parameter empty, 20 entries are returned on each page.

> We recommend that you do not leave this parameter empty.

parameters.name: Remark
parameters.description: The name or IP address of the server.

parameters.name: SearchCriteriaList
parameters.description: The conditions that are used to query the details about the asset fingerprint.

parameters.name: Uuid
parameters.description:
The UUID of the server.

> You can call the [DescribeCloudCenterInstances](~~DescribeCloudCenterInstances~~) operation to query the UUIDs of servers.
